author: trawick
msg: send and receive buffer sizes are not flags, and caller
may pass different values on different calls; so don't
try to optimize this setsockopt()
SO_LINGER is an odd one; the real setsockopt provides
a configurable value for the timeout; but with APR, this
is a flag and the timeout is hardcoded; so the optimization
stays for this one
Reviewed by: Joe Orton

author: jorton
msg: Merge r179564 from trunk:
* buckets/apr_buckets_file.c (file_bucket_read): If an EOF was read,
the file must have been truncated; in this case, do not insert a new
FILE bucket, and do return APR_EOF to the caller.
* test/testbuckets.c (test_truncfile): Add test case.
Submitted by: trawick, jorton
